## WhereBuilder.between() method

Add a `between` condition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
between<K extends KeyOf<MT>>(key: K, val1: MT[K], val2: MT[K]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>K</code> | Property name |
|  val1 | <code>MT[K]</code> | Property value lower bound |
|  val2 | <code>MT[K]</code> | Property value upper bound |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
